description:
Everything you love about Vogue - anytime, anywhere. Get the news, shop the latest trends, and connect with fellow fashion obsessives from around the world with the Vogue app.

On the Vogue app, you can:
- Get the inside line on the top stories from Vogue editors.
- Engage with fellow fashion enthusiasts in discussions on your favorite topics.
- Shop editor-approved buys and the latest trends all within the app.
- Test your runway IQ with our daily Runway Genius quiz.
- Discover new topics to join the conversation across the globe.
- Never miss a story by following Vogue editors and contributors and exploring their latest posts.
- Take a front row seat at every international show.
- Explore our archive of 20,000+ fashion shows by designer, season, location and type
- Browse 1 million+ runway images— dating back to 1988—with AI-powered image search.
- Vote on your favorite looks, then see how your selects stack up to the Vogue community.
- Save looks and collections to your mood boards, with advanced organizational tools.
- Get a close-up look at all the details from Dior, Chanel, Louis Vuitton, and so much more.
- Follow your favorite brands and topics so you never miss a Vogue moment.
- Share your favorite looks and collections with others via email, text, and social media.
- Browse thousands of photos capturing street style worldwide, shot by our renowned photographers.
- Read reviews from Vogue’s internationally recognized writers for our insider take.

The app is free to download. Subscribers receive unlimited digital access to Vogue Runway. Users need to be logged in and subscribed to access Vogue Runway content. All Vogue subscribers will have unlimited digital access to the app as part of their existing subscription. App subscribers have full access to the Web site. Users who have trouble accessing stories can e-mail appfeedback@vogue.com for assistance.


You can choose from two subscription options:


- Monthly subscription: $4.99. Non-refundable. Cancel anytime.
- Annual subscription: $19.99. Non-refundable. Cancel anytime.


Prices above are shown in USD and they’ll be shown in your local currency at the time of purchase.

Subscriptions may be managed by the user, and auto-renewal may be turned off by updating the user’s App Store Subscription settings after purchase. Payment will be charged to iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.


Please note: Users can cancel their subscription anytime from App Store settings.

Information about our Terms of Service & Privacy Policy can be found at:
Privacy Policy: http://www.condenast.com/privacy-policy
App User Agreement: https://www.condenast.com/app-terms-of-use

Forbes Slovenija je del dveh velikih mednarodnih mrež – United Medie, ki ima v svojem naboru več kot 120 medijev, in medijske skupine Forbes, ki je navzoča v več deset državah po svetu držav in je od ustanovitve leta 1917 referenca v poslovnem svetu.

Forbes Slovenija je, tako kot Forbes Hrvaška, Forbes Srbija, Forbes BiH in Forbes Črna gora, začel izhajati 14. novembra 2023 v okviru medijske mreže N1, ki ima licenco za digitalne Forbesove izdaje v tem delu Evrope. 

Forbes Slovenija je ekipa profesionalnih novinarjev in urednikov, ki na jasen in objektiven način obravnavamo dogajanje na vseh področjih gospodarskega delovanja, od javnih financ do najnovejših tehnoloških trendov. V ospredje postavljamo ljudi.

S pomočjo napredne digitalne tehnologije zagotavljamo točne in pravočasne informacije ter poglobljene prispevke. Pri svojem delu upoštevamo Forbesove uredniške smernice.

RepairLog is your ultimate companion for keeping every repair and maintenance task in order. Whether it’s fixing a leaky faucet, painting a room, or replacing a window, the app helps you log every detail - from what was repaired to when, how much it cost, and who did the work. You can organize repairs by rooms or areas, attach notes and always have your home’s maintenance history at hand.

Planning future repairs is just as easy - simply set a date and RepairLog will remind you before the time comes, so you never forget an important task. You can also track your total spending and view clear statistics to understand where your budget goes. With a clean and intuitive interface, RepairLog makes it simple to stay on top of home care, reduce stress, and keep your space in perfect shape all year round.

Listen AI: Unveiling the Power of Text-to-Speech

Turn Text into Speech and Open Your Ears to the Written Word

Listen AI isn't just a text-to-speech tool, it's your effortless companion for a world of information, narrated at your pace. Here's how Listen AI elevates your experience:

Unmatched Vocal Majesty: Immerse yourself in a variety of crystal-clear, expressive voices that blur the line between human and machine. Choose from a range of accents and personalities to find the perfect narrator for any content, be it a casual blog post or a formal report.

Customization at Your Fingertips: Tailor your listening experience to your preferences. Adjust the speaking rate to match your comprehension speed, or fine-tune the volume for optimal comfort.

Effortless Integration: Forget copy-pasting. Listen AI seamlessly converts text from documents and web pages into spoken content. Highlight a passage on a website, a section in a PDF, or an entire document, and Listen AI will bring it to life with its captivating narration.

Multitasking Masterclass: Free up your eyes and ears for other activities. Listen to articles, web pages, and PDFs while you exercise, commute, cook, or complete chores. Listen AI lets you learn and stay informed while you conquer your to-do list.

Accessibility Champion: Listen AI is a game-changer for those with visual impairments or learning disabilities. Reading lengthy documents or educational materials can be a challenge. Listen AI transforms text into an engaging audio experience, making learning and information access more accessible than ever before.

Listen AI: It's not just reading, it's experiencing.

Terms and Conditions: https://static.listenai.app/terms-conditions-en.html
Privacy Policy: https://static.listenai.app/privacy-en.html
Community Guidelines: https://static.listenai.app/community-guidelines-en.html

Peech – Turn Anything Into Audiobooks!

Meet Peech, your personal AI-powered reading sidekick that transforms all your text - PDFs, web articles, physical books, and more - into crystal-clear audiobooks. Whether you’re racing through study notes, catching up on blog posts, or diving into that spicy new novel, Peech has you covered.

The Magic of AI Voices
	• Smart Voice Matching: Peech’s advanced AI picks the perfect voice for each genre - whether it’s serious academic reading or a lighthearted romance.
	• Natural & Lifelike: Our voices are so real, you might forget you’re listening to an app.

Effortless Content Scanning
	• Lightning-Fast OCR: Snap a pic of any page or book, and Peech instantly converts it to audio. No more manual typing!
	• Web & PDF Parsing: Just paste a link or upload a file to start listening - perfect for busy pros, students, and anyone who prefers ears over eyes.

Speedy Reading, On-the-Go
	• High-Speed Playback: Devour your favorite content up to 5x faster - perfect for power-learners or those who want to binge-listen on the run.
	• Playlists & Autoplay: Build custom playlists to keep the stories rolling, so you can multitask like a boss.

One App, All Languages
	• Automatic Language Detection: Peech seamlessly identifies and narrates in 60+ languages.
	• Global Accessibility: Great for language learners, busy professionals, and anyone with reading challenges.

Why Peech?
	• Students: Turn textbooks into engaging audio lectures - study smarter, not harder.
	• Busy Professionals: Catch up on news, memos, or trade articles during your commute.
	• Accessibility: An empowering reading solution for users with visual or reading impairments.
	• Content Lovers: From classics to your favorite steamy novels - Peech reads it all.

Free Trials & Subscriptions

Experience Peech with our flexible subscription plans, some offering free trials. Dive into unlimited content and see how Peech revolutionizes your reading routine - no commitment, no hassle.

Ready to transform your reading life? Give Peech a try and unlock the power of AI-driven audio today!

The world is complex, and changing fast. The Economist app unlocks independent reporting and news analysis from correspondents across the globe. With articles, podcasts, videos and more, our app is a simple way to understand big news developments and why they matter.

Now introducing The Economist Insider, a premium video offering available at launch for subscribers to The Economist. Join senior editors as they explain what's happening now—and what comes next.

What does The Economist cover?

With expert journalists around the world, The Economist reports on politics in America and around the world, as well as economics, business, science, technology and more. We connect the dots to explain the news today and implications for tomorrow.

Why choose The Economist app?

- Read global, fact-checked news reporting anywhere
- Listen to award-winning podcasts and audio articles
- Watch videos that distill big news 

Get access to independent news reporting on your terms:

- Catch up on the news quickly with The World in Brief 
- Enjoy early access to weekly edition, ahead of print
- Download articles for offline reading

Play news games to test your knowledge:

- Mini crossword: The Economist’s wordplay news puzzle
- Dateline history quiz: guess when news extracts were published 
- Pint-sized news quiz: have you been following the latest headlines?

Enjoy additional features:

- Bookmark news articles to read later
- Give news articles to friends and family
- Read news analysis easily with adjustable text size
- Toggle dark mode

See what The Economist subscribers say:

“Great app, excellent journalism! The Economist is wonderful. The content is interesting and relevant and the reporting is superlative. Equally impressive is the drive to stay relevant by presenting media in multiple formats, from print to podcasts and short videos.”

“Impeccable journalism with an app to match. The Economist doesn’t need my endorsement of the quality of their journalism. It speaks for itself. Rather, I’ll comment that their app is well-designed and refreshing to use…I love being able to easily download entire editions, listen to articles with real narrators and search for past articles.”

Full terms of use: https://www.economist.com/legal/terms-of-use
Our privacy policy: https://www.economist.com/privacy

Introducing the all-new WebNovel – your gateway to thrilling adventures! 

Immerse yourself in a world of captivating novels and embark on unforgettable journeys. We're here to redefine the way you experience online reading: Let's read your adventures. 

Discover a treasure trove of novel genres that will transport you to realms beyond your imagination. The library boasts hundreds of thousands of fanfictions, as well as Western fantasy stories where mythical creatures roam and epic quests unfold. Indulge in the allure of Eastern fantasy, with mesmerising tales of wuxia, xianxia, xuanhuan, and more. Lose yourself in the enchantment of fantasy novels that will keep you spellbound from start to finish.

But that's not all—we've got something special for fans of system novels, litRPGs, and progression fantasy. Experience the thrill of leveling up and unlocking new powers alongside your favourite characters as they navigate immersive game-like worlds.

With WebNovel, you have access to a vast library of captivating novels, including our massive collection of hundreds of thousands of fanfics, written by talented authors from around the globe. Our intuitive interface ensures a seamless reading experience, allowing you to immerse yourself fully in every twist and turn.

Start your reading journey today with WebNovel – where every page is an invitation to escape reality and embark on extraordinary quests. Get ready to read your adventures like never before!

Featured genres: Mystery, Eastern Fantasy, Western Fantasy, Sci-fi, Fan-fic, Xianxia, Xuanhuan, Wuxia, Romance, Adventure Mangas, Comics, Manhua, Webtoon

Original and Exclusive Novels: Supreme Magus, My Vampire System. Shadow Slave

Exclusive Comic/Manga/Manhua/Manhwa/Webtoon: Beauty and the Beast, When Beauty meets Beasts

Interested in writing or having a story that you seek to share? Start now by joining thousands of aspiring authors through sharing your stories on WebNovel. “The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.” Join our various contests and publish your novel with our matchmaking system to millions of readers who share a similar interest in your genre. Find your voice and share your message with the world.

Multiple book genres await you to explore on WebNovel, from epic fantasies to hundreds of thousands of unique fanfictions. 

Anyone can find novels/comics/manga/manhua/fanfics/webtoons that they are interested in on WebNovel. Try it out now without any further delay!

Stay ahead of breaking news in politics, sport and culture. Explore a range of tools and advice, from building your wealth to looking after your health. Keep your ear to the ground with Telegraph Podcasts, including the latest news from Ukraine, gripping investigations and the inside scoop on today’s biggest talking points. And train your brain with Telegraph Puzzles, like Sudoku, PlusWord, Panagram, Sorted and the Cryptic Crossword. 

Not yet a Telegraph Subscriber? Download the app now to try 14 days free – no payment details required. 

Follow the latest breaking news

Stay ahead of the stories shaping our world, from News and Business to Politics and Sport. Visit the Latest section for breaking news headlines, as they unfold in the UK, US and around the world. Or tap Home to scroll through the day’s biggest stories, with live blogs, videos and photo galleries, plus free-thinking comment and in-depth analysis.

Expert advice

Make the best decisions for you and your family. Whether you’re managing your money, looking after your health, planning your next holiday or searching for the perfect school or university, you’ll find a range of practical, valuable advice from names you can trust.
See how the latest news affects your plans – and learn how to turn it to your advantage. You’ll also find a wide range of useful tools and guides, to help you plan your next step with confidence.

Read the daily digital newspaper

Enjoy the digital editions of The Daily Telegraph and Sunday Telegraph anytime, anywhere. They're just like the printed editions of the newspaper, including all your favourite sections, supplements and magazines, like Telegraph Magazine.

Every day’s edition of the newspaper is available from 5am. What's more, once you've downloaded your newspaper, you can browse it online or offline. So whether you’re travelling to work, need some food for thought over lunch, or you’re just relaxing at home, you’ll be able to read the full range of our unrivalled insight, expert tips and in-depth long reads.

Stay ahead

Set up notifications and never miss a moment, whether it’s a breaking news story, a major sporting event, the latest updates in business and finance, a must-read interview or opinion from your favourite journalists.

Listen to podcasts

Visit our Podcast Centre for a widely acclaimed range of audio-journalism. Listen to Ukraine: The Latest, get the inside track on the news in The Daily T, tune in to Planet Normal or listen to a gripping investigation, like Bed of Lies.

Read subscriber-only newsletters

Enjoy more from your favourite Telegraph journalists. Read a selection of their subscriber-only newsletters.

Newsletters in the app include Matt’s weekly newsletter, Your Royal Appointment, Investor and Beyond Brexit Bulletin.

Play Telegraph Puzzles

Boost your mood and your brain power, wherever life takes you. Play games like the Mini Crossword, PlusWord, Panagram, Killer Sudoku and the Cryptic Crossword.

Don’t have a Puzzles Subscription? Worry not, upgrading your access is quick and simple.

N.B.
- Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
- Your subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period
- Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period
- You can manage your subscription and switch off the auto-renewal by accessing your Apple ID after purchase

If you're a Telegraph Print Subscriber, you can use the app by validating your subscriber number and postcode within the app.

Privacy Policy: http://www.telegraph.co.uk/topics/about-us/3691972/Privacy-and-Cookie-Policy.html

Terms and conditions: http://www.telegraph.co.uk/topics/about-us/3692012/Terms-and-Conditions.html

You know where we are if you need us. For support or feedback, please contact us via product_app@telegraph.co.uk.

Discover award-winning journalism with the New Scientist app. From artificial intelligence to climate change, and the latest innovations in healthcare to the mysteries of quantum physics and the human mind, New Scientist is your trusted, impartial source of information about what is going on in the world.

Read daily news updates and our latest issues
Watch fascinating videos – from robotics to rare animal behaviour
Listen to our weekly podcast and audio articles

Download the app for free now.

Already a subscriber?
Log in with your newscientist.com account to unlock your full access.

Need help? Visit newscientist.com/help

Download The Atlantic’s app for complete coverage of politics, tech, culture, and more. Sharpen your perspective with reporting that examines the world with depth and accuracy. Challenge your assumptions with big ideas and bold arguments from Atlantic journalists. Spark your curiosity with magazine features that go deep into subjects you never considered before. And now, unlock unlimited access to all of our journalism, on any device, with a monthly or annual subscription.

Atlantic App Features:

TODAY: Every day, our editors bring you a selection of Atlantic stories that made them think—and think again. Exclusively on the app.

LATEST: Quickly browse our most recently published stories from all sections, and save stories to read later.

IN-APP AUDIO HUB: Enjoy narrated articles and podcasts directly from the app—from quick listens to deeper dives.

OFFLINE READING: Download stories to read offline, wherever you are and whenever you want.

UNLIMITED ACCESS: Read as many Atlantic articles as you’d like, in the app or on the web, with a monthly or annual subscription.

BEAUTIFUL DESIGN: Enjoy a clean and quiet reading experience, available in Dark Mode for evening reading.

THE ATLANTIC CROSSWORD: Now available in a dedicated section, our daily puzzle gets bigger and more challenging every day.

ACCESSIBLE TO ALL READERS: Support for VoiceOver and large text sizes.

Terms and conditions: https://www.theatlantic.com/terms-and-conditions/ 

If you have any questions, please contact The Atlantic’s Customer Care team at support@theatlantic.com or (855) 940-0585.

description:
Najmanj 132 strani vrhunskih prispevkov in fotografij. Zagotovite si svoj izvod! Revija NATIONAL GEOGRAPHIC pokriva širok spekter znanosti: geografijo, zoologijo, botaniko, ekologijo, zgodovino, arheologijo, etnologijo, sociologijo, antropologijo, geologijo, kemijo, fiziko, astronomijo, sodobno tehnologijo, potovanja, dogodke in pojave - z vsega sveta in iz SLOVENIJE! Ena od temeljnih odlik revije je, da je namenjena prav vsem. Članki so namreč napisani v poljudnem jeziku in tako dostopni bralcem najrazličnejših poklicev in starosti. Predvsem pa je to revija za vse, ki jim niso dovolj suhoparne informacije, ampak preprosto želijo več.

Naše pogoje uporabe (EULA) najdete na https://www.nationalgeographic.si/splosni-pogoji-dostopa-do-e-revije/

The CNN app is your destination for unrivaled, fact-based reporting. Stay informed at every turn as the story breaks through short-form videos, interactives, articles, podcasts, live audio and more. Easily discover the day's top news from politics, health, world news, climate and beyond.

Download the CNN app to start making sense of the world today.

START STREAMING THE CNN EXPERIENCE TODAY.
Now watch unlimited streaming, including 24/7 global news, daily programs from trusted journalists, award-winning shows and films, and more.

FOLLOW LIVE UPDATES.
Set custom alerts and notifications so you can follow developing stories. Our "live update" articles evolve as the news comes in, giving you accurate updates as they happen.

WATCH THE STORY UNFOLD.
See it for yourself with CNN’s live video or be in the know quickly with CNN Shorts.

STAY SHARP WITH EXPERT INSIGHTS.
Delivering in-depth analysis and context that matters from award-winning journalists, so you're prepared for what's next.

DIVE DEEPER WITH LIVE REPORTING.
Enjoy a 5-minute preview of CNN live. Unlock unlimited viewing, including CNN's original series and documentary collection, CNN, CNN International, and HLN by logging into your TV provider. Stay caught up with video clips, no login necessary.

TAKE A BREAK.
From travel and style news to the latest in entertainment, discover feel-good stories and get a daily dose of positivity.

LISTEN TO STAY CONNECTED.
Listen to top headlines anywhere you go with live audio from CNN, CNN en Español, CNN International and HLN. Hear the week's biggest and most talked-about stories with the "1 Thing" podcast.
 
DIGITAL SUBSCRIPTION (Available in the United States)
All Access plan - The premium CNN experience: streaming, exclusive videos, articles, and more.
• 24/7 global news
• Live coverage
• Exclusive videos
• Original series
• Award-winning films
• Unlimited articles

Basic plan - The basic CNN experience
• Unlimited articles

Your subscription will automatically renew at the then-current price of your plan unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the renewal. Your App Store account will automatically be charged at the same price for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of your current subscription period. You can manage your subscription by visiting the App Store or under Settings on your Apple device.

Straight Arrow News delivers unbiased, fact-based news and context, helping you make sense of what’s happening in your world.

Watch the latest news updates and original video podcasts whenever you want through your queue, and read and listen to stories on the go.

Plus, discover reporting you're not seeing from mainstream media outlets. SAN’s Media Miss™ and Media Landscape tools highlight stories right- and left-leaning outlets aren't covering–revealing a more complete picture of the news.

From politics to business, sports, lifestyle and everything in between, SAN covers the stories unfolding around the country and world that matter to you–without spin and with key context that deepens your understanding beyond the headlines.

Erotica is where traditional storytelling meets sexual wellbeing.

Erotica adult stories app was created thinking about women and couples. We aim to bring people a healthier alternative to visual porn. Applications like Galatea Stories, and Radish inspired us to think about bringing content that can be not just read but also listened to. Audio sex covers straight and queer storylines in various themes.

Our audio stories cover straight and lesbian storylines in various environments. If you are into sexting like slutbot: juicebox, dirty talk, naughty fantasies, and fiction, then Erotica audiobook-like stories are just for you!

Stories can be influential, especially erotic ones. You might have heard of Literotica, but this is much better. Use your own imagination to fill the blanks in your own way. Erotica app can be a way for you to avoid random Tinder hookups and enjoy the time with orgasm on your terms.

We see Women’s sexual wellness as important as general wellbeing. In our eyes, sexual selfcare is a topic that is not yet talked about enough.

Erotica was created for Women and Couples and is also LBGTQ friendly. More than 80% of listeners say that Erotica had a positive effect on their sexual wellness. The best part is that the stories leave you hands-free! Just press play, get comfortable and enjoy.

What is Erotica great for:
* Build better evening habits
* Use the app for meditation before sleep
* Discover stories of your taste
* Stroke your imagination

* Reconnecting with your body
We at Erotica are working hard to bring you new stories weekly. Join now and improve your sexual wellness today!

Erotica is free to download and use. We’re always looking for ways to bring more quality content to our users. Also as Dipsea, Tryquinn, Emjoy, and OhCleo, we strive to bring top-quality sexy audio stories to our adult audience.

KTool.io: Send web articles, newsletters and RSS to Kindle. Build a reading habit with KTool today!

You spend too much time on computer screens. It damages our eyesight and hurts our comprehension.

KTool helps you read everything on Kindle instead.

Less eyestrain. More focus 

———

H O W    T O    U S E

Installing this app will add a KTool Share Target to your mobile phone. Share articles with KTool Share Target to read them on your Kindle.

Send long web articles to your Kindle to read later. Read anywhere: on your Kindle e-reader or the Kindle app on your smartphone (any platform). Articles are available for offline reading once delivered to the Kindle.

———

F E A T U R E S

— New: Send documents to Kindle (PDF, DOCX and EPUB)
— Add articles to Daily Read or Weekly Read
— Read newsletter on Kindle
— Send Wikipedia articles to Kindle
— Send Hacker News discussions to Kindle
— Dark Mode

— Speedy delivery to your Kindle
— Support articles behind paywalls
— Image support
— Emoji support
— Keyboard short-cut support
— Read Twitter threads on Kindle
— Read RSS on Kindle (WIP)

KTool can send to the following devices:

—  Kindle e-readers sold by Amazon
—  iPhone/iPad Kindle app
—  Kindle app on other platforms

———

T E S T    D R I V E

You can test KTool's functionality without install the plugin by using this web portal: https://ktool.io/read-on-kindle

Example articles:

1. The saddest “just ship it” story (2020)
https://kitze.io/posts/saddest-just-ship-it-story-ever

2. Substack’s Ideology
https://every.to/divinations/substack-s-ideology

———

C O N T A C T

KTool: https://ktool.io
Support: daniel (at) podzim.co
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ktool_io

———

P R I V A C Y

This extension does not do anything unless you click the Send to Kindle button. We do not monitor or inject any scripts into your pages while you browse.

When you click the Kindle icon, this extension sends the contents of the page and its URL to the KTool service. The KTool service then packages the contents into a reader-ready format and delivers it to your Kindle.

Content which you process with the KTool service will be cached on the server for a short period.

More information on our privacy page: https://ktool.io/privacy. Feel free to contact us if you have any questions.

T E R M S  O F  U S E

Got a growing TBR list? See great book recommendations, but forget them later? Meet TBR Bookshelf!

Easily track books you want to read, are currently reading, or have finished with no limits. Rate and review books once you’ve read them and log your favorite moments using our quick and intuitive rating system. Browse public ratings to see a book’s POV, tropes, reread rate, and up to four genre-specific ratings. For example, Romance tracks Spice, Fluff, Humor, and Tear. All ratings are anonymous, so you can be honest with your reviews.

Within our rating system, you can log:
* Reading format
* 5 Star Rating including half stars
* Up to four genre ratings
* If you would reread a book
* DNF (Did Not Finish)
* Favorite characters and quotes
* Series and standalone books
* Pro quotes and annotations (Paid Subscription Required)
* Any additional thoughts about the book
Celebrate your reading milestones with special book confetti and earn stickers for completing books and certain book tropes.
Exclusive Pro features include:
* Book tropes
* Book playlists to track songs (cannot be played within the app)
* POV format and amount
* TV show and movie adaptation ratings
* Four seasonal ratings
All users can create custom yearly reading goals. When you finish a book, it is automatically added to your yearly reading goal bookshelf. Pro users can also fully customize their bookshelves with color themes, bookshelf items, and layouts.

TBR Bookshelf makes managing your TBR list fun, easy, and satisfying. Track books, set reading goals, log quotes, and discover new reads all in one place. With customizable shelves, anonymous ratings, and a supportive community, staying on top of your reading has never been more enjoyable.

Join TBR Bookshelf, a woman-owned and operated company, BookTok’s favorite, and trusted by millions of readers.

TBR Bookshelf is free to download and use. No account or sign-up is required. TBR Bookshelf Pro includes a 7-day free trial and then options for a monthly plan ($4.99), a 6-month plan ($19.99), or a yearly plan ($29.99). All other features remain free indefinitely.

A subscription will be applied to your iTunes account at the end of your free trial. Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can cancel anytime in your iTunes account settings. Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription.

These prices are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary.

Note: This app is for tracking your reading journey. Reading is not available within the app.

Privacy Policy: http://jordanpetersonstudio.com/tbr-bookshelf-privacy-policy/ Terms of Service: http://jordanpetersonstudio.com/tbr-bookshelf-terms-of-service/

description:
Gaste: Akıllı Resmi Gazete

Resmi Gazete içeriklerini okumak hiç bu kadar kolay olmamıştı! Gaste, Resmî Gazete verilerini yapay zekâ desteğiyle kullanıcı dostu bir deneyime dönüştürüyor.

Öne Çıkan Özellikler:

 Güncel Resmî Gazete: Yayınlanan tüm Resmî Gazete içeriklerine anında erişim.

 AI Destekli Özetler: Uzun metinleri dakikalar içinde anlaşılır özetlere dönüştürür.

 Akıllı Arama: İlgilendiğiniz kanun, yönetmelik veya kararları kolayca bulun.

 Favorilere Ekleme: İstediğiniz içerikleri kaydedin, dilediğiniz zaman tekrar inceleyin.

 Bildirimler: İlgi alanlarınıza göre yeni içerikler yayınlandığında anında haberdar olun.

 Arşiv ve Kategoriler: Geçmiş sayılara ulaşın, içerikleri kategori bazlı görüntüleyin.

 AI ile Sor: Seçtiğiniz bir madde veya tüm arşiv hakkında sorular sorun, yapay zekâdan yanıt alın.

Neden Gaste?

Hızlı, anlaşılır ve kullanıcı dostu.

Hukukçular, akademisyenler, kamu çalışanları ve vatandaşlar için vazgeçilmez bir araç.

Zaman kazandırır, bilgiye erişimi kolaylaştırır.

Gaste ile Resmî Gazete her zaman elinizin altında.

Hemen indirin, geleceği yakalayın!
